japanese:
（ふう……。
　今日は騒ぎすぎて、いつもよりお腹がすきました）
translation:
(Whew...
 We really had a lot of fun today.
 I'm hungrier than usual.)

japanese:
（ええ、だからお昼を
　たくさん食べてしまったのです。
　決して食べすぎなわけではありません！）
translation:
(Yes, that's why I ate a lot at lunch.
 It's not like I ate too much, though!)

japanese:
（それに、ようやく食料を切り詰める生活とは
　お別れなわけですから）
translation:
(And, we're finally saying goodbye
 to the life of economizing food.)

japanese:
（はあ……。
　早く島を出て、夏の新作スイーツを
　食べ歩きしたいですね）
translation:
(*sigh*
 I want to leave the island as soon as possible
 and eat new summer sweets.)

japanese:
（一花？
　そういえば、早々に食事を切り上げてましたね）
translation:
(Ichika?
 Come to think of it, she ended her meal early.)

japanese: ……ふう。
translation: ...Whew.

japanese:
（またスマホを見てる？
　みんなと話し合って、少しは不安を軽くできたと
　思ったのですが……）
translation:
(Is she looking at your phone again?
 I thought she was able to alleviate her anxiety
 a little after talking with everyone...)

japanese: （私は、他の姉妹が困っていたら全力で支えたい）
translation:
(I want to do my best to support my sisters
 if they are in trouble.)

japanese:
（そんな子どもっぽい気持ちではどうにもならない
　社会の厳しさというものがあるだろうことは
　わかっています）
translation:
(Society isn't kind to those who can't
 do anything about their childish feelings.)

japanese: （それに……）
……一花。
translation: ...Ichika.

japanese:
ん？
五月ちゃんか、どうしたの？
translation:
Hm?
Itsuki-chan, what's wrong?

japanese:
疲れてしまいましたか？
ぼーっとしていたようですが。
translation:
Are you tired or something?
You looked like you were staring into space.

japanese:
ああ、違うよ。
さっき撮った写真を整理してたんだ。
translation:
Ah, no.
I was organizing the pictures I took earlier.

japanese:
ほら見て？
最初はみんなぎこちなかったけど、
だんだん、いい笑顔をするようになってるでしょ？
translation:
Here, look?
Everyone was so awkward at the start,
but you all gradually started to give great smiles.

japanese:
もちろん、最初のうちの面白い顔も
厳選してアルバムに載せたいけどね。
translation:
Of course,
I also want to carefully select the funny faces
from the beginning and put them on the album.

japanese:
あ、でも五月ちゃん的には、
集合写真の変顔はなかったことにしたい感じかな？
translation:
Oh, but you, Itsuki-chan,
you wanted to make sure
there were no group photo funny faces, right?

japanese:
……一花。
あなたも、そろそろ
写真を撮ってもらったらどうでしょう？
translation:
...Ichika.
Don't you think it's about time you had your picture
taken as well?

japanese:
私や他のみんなにカメラマンを任せて、
上杉君とも一緒に。
translation:
Take some with Uesugi-kun.
Leave the photographing to me and everyone else.

japanese: 私だけでなく……みんなもきっとそう思っています。
translation:
Not only me...
I'm sure everyone else is thinking it, too.

japanese:
ちゃんと、らいはちゃんや上杉君とも
一緒に想い出を作らないと。
translation:
You need to make memories
with Raiha-chan and Uesugi-kun as well.

japanese:
素敵な提案をしてくれたあなたが
心から笑っていないアルバムなんて、
意味がありません。
translation:
There's no point in an album where you,
the one who MADE this wonderful suggestion
in the first place, aren't laughing your heart out too.

japanese:
ねえ、五月ちゃん？
そんなに気にすることないよ。
translation:
Hey, Itsuki-chan?
Don't worry about that so much.

japanese:
ただ、私は撮るのは向いてないなーって
思ってただけだから。
translation:
The reason I sighed back there was
I was just thinking
I'm not good at taking pictures.

japanese: えっ？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
私がスマホを見ながら落ち込んでたから、
心配してくれたんだよね？
translation:
You were worried about me because
I was looking at my smartphone
with sort of a sad look, right?

japanese: そ、そうではなくて……。
translation: T-that's not it...

japanese:
やっぱプロのカメラマンってすごいや。
私が撮った写真とは雲泥の差、って、
比べるのも失礼なくらいだよ。
translation:
Really, professional photographers are amazing.
Their pictures are a world of difference from mine.
It's almost rude to compare them with the photos I took.

japanese:
でも、こういうのは気持ちも大切だから。
うん、気持ちは負けてない！
translation:
But passion is also important in these things.
That's right, I haven't lost my passion!

japanese:
じゃあ私、スマホ充電してくるね。
またあとで。
translation:
Well, I'm gonna charge my smartphone, okay?
See you later.

japanese: 一花、あなたは……。
translation: Ichika, you...

japanese:
（本当は、遠慮しているんでしょう？
　修学旅行のことをまだ気に病んで……）
translation:
(Really, you're holding back, aren't you?
 You're still worrying about the school trip...)

japanese:
（だから三玖や二乃、四葉や私にまで
　上杉君との楽しい想い出を作れるようにと
　気を遣ってくれている）
translation:
(That's why you're taking extra care
 to ensure Miku, Nino, Yotsuba and even I
 make fun memories with Uesugi-kun.)

japanese:
（きっとあなたは……自身にその資格はないと、
　自分を責めているのでしょう？）
translation:
(I'm sure...
 that you're blaming yourself,
 thinking you don't deserve to do the same.)
